name: Concept cores only used in machine

pages.text: These Concept Cores can only be used in $(l:io_tools/world_interoperator)World Interoperator$() machine to gain products. Recommended to see jei for recipes.
This concept core imitates a vanilla ghast farm, outputs the drop of ghasts.
This concept core imitates a vanilla piglin farm, outputs the drop of piglins.
This concept core imitates a vanilla iron golem farm, outputs the drop of iron golems.
This concept core imitates a vanilla mob grinder, outputs the mixing of vanilla mobs' drop.
This concept core imitates a vanilla shulker farm, outputs shulker shells.
